participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and supportive, Liam enjoys helping others and values personal connections.
participant_1.background: I prefer bananas because they are sweet and easy to eat. I starred in television commercials when I was young. I live in Toronto, Canada. I was happy to find a new gym near my home in New Mexico. I type one handed.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Caring and a bit introverted, Emily often puts others' needs before her own but also strives to enjoy life.
participant_2.background: I sometimes forget to take care of myself because I am too busy. I am a nurse. I enjoy spending my time with my two beagles, Chance and Boomer. My shyness made me panic and I did not show up. I don't have a car, but my family and I love to drink Coke together.

content.text: Hey, what do you do for a living?
Oh cool! I was a nurse for a few years. Do you like it?
I love it! It can be very busy at times, but it's so rewarding.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I think that's why I switched careers. I wanted something less stressful.
I can definitely see why. Nursing can be a lot of work. What do you do now?
I'm a personal trainer. I help people get in shape and live a healthier lifestyle.
That sounds really cool! Do you enjoy it?
I love it! It's so rewarding to help people reach their goals.
I bet it is! I'm glad you found something you love to do.
Thank you! I'm glad I found nursing too. It's a great career.
I'm sure it is. My two beagles, Chance and Boomer, would love to hear about your job. They love to run around and play.
I'm sure they would! I love dogs. I had a dog when I was younger, but I don't have one now.
Aw, that's too bad. Dogs are so great. They're always happy to see you.
They are! I miss having one around.
Well, you're always welcome to come over and visit mine. They love meeting new people.
Thanks! I'll definitely take you up on that.
